SELECT division_code divisionCode, division_name divisionName FROM division ORDER BY divisionName;

SELECT e.emp_no empNo, e.emp_name empName, e.dept_code deptCode, de.dept_name deptName, di.division_name divisionName, r.rank_name rankName FROM employee e INNER JOIN `rank` r ON e.rank_no = r.rank_no INNER JOIN department de ON e.dept_code = de.dept_code INNER JOIN division di ON de.division_code = di.division_code WHERE e.dept_code = #{deptCode} ORDER BY e.rank_no DESC

SELECT e.emp_no empNo, e.emp_name empName, e.dept_code deptCode, de.dept_name deptName, di.division_name divisionName, r.rank_name rankName FROM employee e INNER JOIN `rank` r ON e.rank_no = r.rank_no INNER JOIN department de ON e.dept_code = de.dept_code INNER JOIN division di ON de.division_code = di.division_code WHERE e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName}, '%') ORDER BY e.rank_no DESC
